item.title: Notes on Econometrics
item.description: Tests & Statistics \(R^2\) t-test F-test (Joint Test) Wald Test J Test PE Test Chow (Breakpoint) Test Gauss-Markov Assumptions OLS Error Normality of \(ε\) Unbiasedness of \(s^2\) Consistency of \(s^2\) OLS Estimator Derive Normality of \(b\) Unbiasedness of \(b\) Consistent of \(b\) (Asymptotic) Efficienty BLUE (Best Linear Unbiased Estimator) CAN (Consistent and Asymptotically Normal) OLS Model Converge in Probability & Mean Square LLN (Law of Large Numbers) Interpretation Elasticity Regression Table IV (Instrument Variable) IV Estimator \(\hat{β}_{IV}\) GIVE (Generalized IV Estimator) Heteroskedasticity & Autocorrelation White (Hetero-Consistent) Standard Error HAC Standard Error Maximum Likelihood Model Compare Models Linear / Log & Interaction : F-stat OLS / GLS : Robust Standard Error Weird Models R Workout Data Generation OLS Regression Warning: under proofreading

item.title: Rmd Template
item.description: Words of Warning Rmd Reference Reference Cheatsheet Inline Code Executed Display Code R Code Chunk R Code (Inline) Code from Other Languages Reference Image Reference Plot Words of Warning I use Typora to write my posts. It usually processes .Rmd file correctly, but it gets lost in a file as complicated as this one. Always check twice and preview the .html page. DO NOT put spaces right after and before the \(\LaTeX\) $ $ pair or the expression will not be rendered properly.
